The Group

John F Hunt Plant & Tool Hire
Introduction
John F Hunt Plant and Tool Hire provide an outstanding service to the building industry, supplying a vast selection of contractor’s plant, tools and equipment for hire and sale. See our full range at johnfhunthireservices.co.uk
Our branches pride themselves on the excellence of products and customer service from our fully trained staff. From the time you enter one of our extensively stocked showrooms to the time you leave, you can be safe in the knowledge that you will be supported by the John F Hunt brand wherever you are. Trading from locations throughout Essex and London, a modern and well equipped fleet of FORS compliant delivery vehicles, allows us to meet the demands of our customers no matter what size or type of equipment is being delivered. We operate a range of fully equipped service vans, 26 ton Beavertail plant lorries, 60 ton low loaders and for city deliveries we employ smaller trucks with tail lifts.
Planned investment with leading manufacturers including Komatsu, Thwaites, Kubota and Hilti ensures modern machinery fitted with the latest low emission engines and safety features. Our qualified engineers guarantee that the quality and reliability of the products are maintained to the highest of standards. 4
